summary: Zayora website - an orange and blue themed tech product website for bluetooth earbuds and smartwatches, founded by Yash Jaiswal. Features product showcase, partner logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player, Blinkit, PhonePe), contact information, and coming soon section. Includes e-commerce functionality with product listing, cash on delivery checkout, and delivery charges. Company also owns a restaurant named 'ALL IS WELL .KANPUR'. Now includes Holi festival promotion with free delivery offer and countdown timer.
architectural_notes: Product showcase for bluetooth earbuds and smartwatches
E-commerce functionality with product listing and pricing
Cash on delivery payment method only
Product review section for customer testimonials
WhatsApp contact integration for customer care
Orange and blue dual-color theme for website
YouTube video integration for promotional content
Restaurant business section for 'ALL IS WELL .KANPUR'
PhonePe logo integration in partner section

Add 'Coming Soon on Blinkit' section with Blinkit logo in color
